short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Find on Amazon, buy from local bookstores. Easily find the book that you're looking for and support the local bookshops you love.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
IndieBooks is a Chrome extension that helps local bookstores compete against Amazon by providing an easy and convenient way for book lovers to buy books directly from their favorite indie stores instead of from Amazon.

Get started in 3 simple steps!
üíæ  Install the extension from the Google Chrome marketplace.
üîç  Search for a book just as you would normally do on Amazon. After finding the book in the search results, visit the product's page for more details. On the right-hand side of this page is where you'll see the IndieBooks extension! IndieBooks displays a list of bookstores in your area with links to where to purchase the exact book you are viewing.
üìö  With one click, you can find the book you searched for at the local bookstore of your choice.  If the bookstore is sold out, no worries! You can try the next bookstore on the list!
